text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Juvenile facility" means a property used for a juvenile program that is:
operated under the authority of:
a county or municipal corporation, or both;
a for profit organization; or
a nonprofit organization; and
wholly owned by the entity described in paragraph (1) of this subsection; or
leased by the entity if:

"Juvenile program" means a:
program that:
provides residential services to youth placed by the Department; or
nonresidential program that under contract to the State provides educational, vocational, recreational, counseling, or other day services to youth.
